back_cards.example_en: She bought four apples from the market.

back_cards.definition_en: A group or set of four
back_cards.example_en: The band consists of four members.
They stayed at the cabin for four days.
Her son is four years old now.
He finished in fourth place in the race.
Draw a straight line on the paper.
We waited in line for the concert tickets.
The product comes in a new line of colors.
The river marks the line between the two towns.
The phone line was down during the storm.
The girl played soccer with her friends.
Their girl just started kindergarten.

back_cards.definition_en: A young woman in a casual context
back_cards.example_en: The girls went out for coffee after work.
She’s a sweet girl who loves to help others.
The scout troop welcomed a new girl this week.
There’s a great café around the corner.
The project will take around three weeks.
The dog ran around the tree chasing its tail.
They traveled around the city all day.
She wrapped a scarf around her neck.
We sat on the hill to watch the sunset.

back_cards.definition_en: To monitor or keep track of
back_cards.example_en: The teacher asked us to watch the clock.
Can you watch my bag while I’m gone?

back_cards.definition_en: To view a show or event
back_cards.example_en: They watch their favorite series every weekend.
Watch your step on the icy sidewalk.
The store is open until 9 p.m.
You can’t leave until you finish your homework.
She worked until exhaustion every night.
They stayed in the cabin until the storm passed.
I won’t decide until I hear all the options.
Her father taught her how to ride a bike.
He is considered the father of modern physics.
The village father gave wise advice to all.
His father came to this country decades ago.
The congregation listened to Father John’s sermon.

back_cards.definition_en: To rest with the body supported by the buttocks
back_cards.example_en: She likes to sit by the window and read.
Please sit at the front for the presentation.
The book has been sitting on the shelf for years.
The family sat for a photo at the reunion.
The house sits on a quiet hill.
She loves to create art with recycled materials.
The chef created a new dish for the menu.
The announcement created excitement in the crowd.
The team worked to create a user-friendly app.
They aim to create a community garden this spring.
The website has information about local events.
She gathered information for her research paper.
Can you give me information on train schedules?
The email contained sensitive information.
He lacks information about the new policies.
